Package sample.Java

Class AlbumDAO

java.lang.Object
sample.Java.AlbumDAO
public class AlbumDAO
extends java.lang.Object
AlbumDAO is a class which is used as a connection between the Album class and the database. This way we can add albums and get all albums from the database and use them.
